title: Textile, "MERLIN", 1990
medium: Technique: Jacquard woven foundation. Fabric specially woven in Korea to coordinate with the printed pattern. Screen printed.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 309 x 112 cm (10 ft. 1 5/8 in. x 44 1/8 in.)
Repeat H: 101 cm (39 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Pauline Cooper Noyes and General Acquisitions Endowment Funds
description: Ribbons of film and shapes resembling a camera shutter and brushstrokes. Green, two shades of blue, purple and brown on cream. The same camera shutter and seashell shapes are on the woven ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "MERLIN", 1990.
1990. Technique: Jacquard woven foundation. Fabric specially woven in Korea to coordinate with the printed pattern. Screen printed.. Museum purchase from Pauline Cooper Noyes and General Acquisitions Endowment Funds. 1991-10-2.
